input: The States of the Indian Union can be reorganised or their boundaries altered by:

options.A: The Union Parliament by a simple majority in the ordinary process of legislation.
options.B: Two-thirds majority of both the Houses of Parliament.
options.C: Two-thirds majority of both the Houses of Parliament and the consent of the legislature of the concerned States.
options.D: An executive order of the Union Government with the consent of the concerned State Governments.

explanation: Such Laws can be passed by a simple majority and by the ordinary legislative process.
